title: Can't connect to authentication server!!
body: I am continuously having this issue. I have researched forums and done everything suggested and still cannot connect. Please help a player out.

replies.body:
I can help you troubleshoot that authentication error!

It looks like there might be some sort interruption going on with your connection. Following all the steps in this [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) can help you troubleshoot and figure out what's causing you not to connect.

If by chance you've already gone through that guide, [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our Tech team can take it from there. :)
I'm having the same issue as of today. Had no issues yesterday. :/
